name: Name
wallpaperHeadingText: We will find a trusted psychotherapist for online consultations without leaving home
enrollHeadingText: How to schedule an appointment and what to expect during a session with a psychotherapist
step1Text: Fill out the questionnaire and receive a list of the most suitable psychologists with experience in your specific area. Over 200 clients have already found a psychologist with us
step2Text: Choose a psychologist that you like. All our specialists go through a selection process, including verification of diploma and education, interview, and recommendations from colleagues
step3Title: Schedule a session with a psychologist
step3Text: Schedule a personal or online session with a psychologist. Consultations at zumcare are convenient and confidential
feedbackTitle: Reviews of our clients who have already got rid of their problems and fears
request5Text: "Lack of motivation even for favorite activities"
onlineTherapyHeaderText: Online therapy is help at your fingertips, anytime
OTAstep1Text: Online consultations with many specialists are cheaper than in-person ones.
OTAstep2Text: Only your therapist will know your history. No need to go to a clinic or office.
OTAstep3Text: Consultations take place in a messenger convenient for you, where you can use audio/video communication. All you need is a good internet connection.
OTAstep4Text: You can get help while sitting under a blanket with a cup of tea, all in the comfort of your home without wasting time and energy on travel.
wroteAboutUsDescriptionText: Click on the company logo to learn more
footerNoticeText: The Zumcare service does not provide emergency psychological or psychiatric services, but only serves as a technical platform for connecting with psychologists and therapists to answer your questions about psychological health. The terms of service are available at:
psychologicalHelpText: Psychological assistance from the City Mental Health Center of Nur-Sultan Akimat +7 702 916 14 06
findSpecialistHeaderText: Psychotherapists and the requests they work with
neverShareEmail: We'll never share your email with anyone else.
fillCredentials: Please, fill in your credentials to log in
passwordTooShort: Password should be at least 8 characters long
passwordLatinLettersOnly: Password can only contain Latin letters

sessionsTable.confirmComplete: Confirm the end of the session?

noAccess: You have no access to this page.

aboutService.title: About the Service
aboutService.description: Zumcare is a service that helps you find a trusted psychologist who can assist you with your needs. We carefully select specialists based not only on their education but also on their ethical principles. Our specialists are recommended by colleagues and mentors.
aboutService.idea: The idea for the service originated from the founders' personal experience of not knowing where to turn for help.

whichCases.title: In which cases is it important to consult a psychotherapist?

whichCasesAdults.case1: Intense reluctance to move or perform simple tasks.
whichCasesAdults.case2: Rapid mood changes for no apparent reason.
whichCasesAdults.case3: Loss of self-confidence and lack of desire to start anything.
whichCasesAdults.case4: Changes in eating behavior: frequent overeating or refusal to eat.
whichCasesAdults.case5: Sleep disturbance: insomnia or constant sleepiness.
whichCasesAdults.case6: Constant fatigue and reluctance to do anything.
whichCasesAdults.case8: Frequent display of aggression and irritability.

whichCasesChildren.case1: Unwillingness to communicate with others, general passivity.
whichCasesChildren.case2: Presence of nervous disorders (childhood fears, hyperactivity, enuresis, etc.).
whichCasesChildren.case4: Depression caused by various factors, etc.
whichCasesChildren.case5: Inappropriate behavior (rudeness, excessive excitability, crying, etc.).

whyZumcare.title: why corporate wellbeing?
whyZumcare.description1: You can trust our psychotherapists with any problem and secret.
whyZumcare.description2: Because we verify each psychotherapist's claimed qualifications and their ability to solve various human problems.
whyZumcare.additionalDescription: Why do we pay more attention to practical experience rather than a psychotherapist's diploma?
whyZumcare.diplomaRequirement: Having a diploma is mandatory, although it doesn't always indicate a person's professionalism. It signifies that the person is interested in psychotherapy, knows more than just the basics, and is willing to devote not only 6 years to education but also their entire life to helping others.
whyZumcare.practicalExperience: On the other hand, practical experience shows how prepared a specialist is for specific problems, how many hours of experience they already have, and whether they can handle difficult cases.
whyZumcare.imagePlaceholder: we can add image or icon here

textItems.1: Diploma of higher psychological and medical education
textItems.4: Presence of successful cases in declared specializations
textItems.5: Knowledge of work and structure of the mind
textItems.6: Level of empathy and ethical principles followed by the specialist
textItems.7: Whether the specialist consulted with more experienced colleagues to solve difficult cases
textItems.8: Total number of consultations (in hours) and client recommendations
textItems.9: Our clients are always our top priority
textItems.10: We consider all suggestions and innovations
textItems.11: We analyze all feedback about the specialist and join in resolving problem situations
textItems.12: If the specialist does not help or does not suit you personally, we will manually select another therapist for you after clarifying the situation
textItems.13: Everything you trust the specialist with remains confidential between you. Psychotherapists sign an agreement with us on the non-disclosure of client information.

howWork.title: How does the service work?
howWork.subtitle: How to find a psychologist?
howWork.description: We have created a specific algorithm that helps us find the most suitable specialist for you.
